post.body: me too.brad works second shift tonight. (For every1) I'm discussing video plans with a girl who likes me..yeah. I mean like that.
welcome to my world Jay. And i don't even hear a naughty song all the time..maybe it's the ppl in my mind..hmmm.
i want to cover our school lawn in pink flamingos for a prank. :) that how i came up with my name on here. Hi pinky! :)
UPDATE!!!!!!! :) i'll give you a naughty vid!!! hehe.. *winkwink*
haHaha. :) i got mojo too!! Speaking of which..should send video tomorrow! Agh!
oh. Are you talking about Austin Powers? O_o?
says wool give her a rash. Rawwwr...
mm..no? What show? Lol. But hey shag me whenever you want! :)
no..but i probably will when i get better.:) i have to get all my mom's stuff done then i'm free to knit.However she picky.
Hahaha! Shag..almost as good as phlegm! :) Okies!
i might have been cause i was dancing? Hmmmm. Or maybe i'm jst a sexy beast like mander_lynn said! :)
nighty night!
you suck.
Haha..:) i bet Brad feels that way too..
that's what i said!!!!!!! totally agree!!!
lol. I didn't want you to avoid pc since i said i had my phone off...
don't worry. :) i turned it back on. What would you do if you couldn't talk to me?
Haha. But i might be moaning over you so i may not hear you..lol. :)
:) if i accidentally eat you tell me..there's bacon on top. :)
yeah. She has GREAT timing..not.
i don't know. Jst haven't felt good. Oh and my Aunt Flo is gonna be here tomorrow thanks for the great gift mother nature..
you be ok. :) if i could i'd gave you a cookie. :)
Well i'm going to bed. Talk to you tomorrow. :)
I'm happy with it. :) so i went from 21min to 8min..i took off 13min of unimportant stuffs..lol.
Cut video down from 21:30:02 to 8:10:12 oh yeah. Lol.
Hmmm. I should have smiled more. I look like a grumpy person. Lol.
:) editing.
Practice runs never hurt right? Hmmmm..
I believe in Santa Claus. I'm jst telling you now..i do. I hope you guys believe too..
To wear a tie or to not wear a tie. That is thy question..
I don't like how some parents don't let their kids dream or have any kind of imagination..poor kids.
Classic traits of 1st born-confident,pays attention to detail, perfectionist,difficult sharing. :) sounds like me..i good at sharing tho.
My eye is twitching & i'm thirsty. Oh. I had 5 people call me Twitchy today..thank you girl calling me Twitchy & spreading it. Haha. :)
I feel like drawing or coloring...hmmm. This movie is perfect..killing and talks/obsessions of sex. Sweet. Hahaha.
I'm trying to decide what i want to do. *Sigh*
"popping pussies into pies! Wouldn't do in my shop!" HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA..:) *Sweeny gags*
I think TODAY is a Sweeny Todd day. :)
I'm avoiding the dishes like they're contaminated with the black plague...
So what should i make for dinner since i have..atleast 3hrs to plan it? Oh i updated my blog.
There was a MAJOR car accident on top of a hill near the office. An explorer was on its SIDE. i almost couldn't stop trying to turn..BAD.
I have the problem of pulling too tight. Oops
:) learning to knit.
Checking out the knitting corner. :) it smells kinda funny. Lol.
Any harder of a step down & the curb & my neck would have f@cked one another. >:-<
Out of class going to get some $ & see if "Stitches" is open to see if they can satisfy my knitting needs. :)
Soy aburrido. *Sigh*
So...Brad...where are ya? O_o?
No Gerald for my mentees. monday they were too distracted & i don't want them slacking off
Apparently i will most likely be going to a stitch-n-bitch group to learn how to knit. :) SWEET!
Hopefully Brad hasn't injured himself beyond natural repair.. :-S poor guy..wish i could help him out somehow.. *Sad sigh*
Ok...bored. I forgot my book in my locker. Rawwwr.
THERE'S A KNITTING PLACE HERE! :) they have classes! THANK YOU MRS. LUNDBERG! :)
Do you suppose my school considers Mr.Rogers gang related? :)
teacher just gave me a funny look for my tie..ahahhaaa.. :) he'll see me again in AA (yes. i'm a cronic drunk..apple juice makes me forget.)
"only limited to 3 downloads a day" WELL HOW ARE PPL SUPPOSED TO WATCH MY NAUGHTY VIDS?! *gahhhhh* *mumbles to self and kicks something*
Are ties considered to be a fashion statement? Hmmm. I remind myself of Mr. Rogers cause i have my tie under a sweatshirt. :)
Wearing my tie to school. :-P :)
Twitchy twitchy twitchy TWITCHY! twitchy is going to bed twitching now. Lol.I bet Brad has a fantasy involving nurses..hmmm. I like sailors!
UPDATED MY BLOG AFTER 2 DAYS (I THINK!!!) http://minxykitty.tumblr.com :)
My hands are so cold..! *Whimpers*
Drew for "secret santa"/ papa noel. :) lol. I gave GREAT IDEAS! :) going to the library quick.
I got started on my scarf!! :)
:) lunch was fun.
in computer lab... i make amazing scones. =D so do the other 2 ppl that helped. lol. :) nom nom. they were cranberry & lemon!!
PANOS GOT ME HORNY! damn! brad fix it!
Oh my flamingos batman! I forgot to update this morning..sorta..well i is now. HI! :)
Jon sprayed me in the face w/ a water bottle.i advanced.Did it again.I grabbed him,twisted his arm/wrist so he fell on the ground screaming.
I hope Brad doesn't mind a singing/girly-ish card..lol. :) ok. Going to bed. :) good night.
Awww! I found an even better card for Brad but i already paid for other one! *Pouts*
Guy at deli counter eyeing me..freaky..
http://www.mordantorange.com/mo/?p=453 heeeehehe...wonder which one is better? :)
http://www.mordantorange.com/mo/?p=450 hahahaaa. :)
just gave brad a rant on yahoo answers...about cookies. =D heheehehe..
Maybe i should email aunt...about mailing packages..hmmm.
I have gotten..4 updates..when i USUALLY get 25+!! this is annoying. *Sigh* eating spaghetti and a turkey sandwich. :)
Okies. Me going to bed now. :) good night. Is today monday? Awww. I thought it was tuesday..*sad sigh* goodnight.
I only got mander_lynn's updates..i know everyone has been updating but i didn't get any!! X(
Uhm...i'm not so sure about sending a wrapped package thru the mail..? I don't know what to do..
Gonna wrap ALL the presents, find a box big enough for Brad's pressies..and watch Jackie Chan! :)
Twitter is broken. X(
TWITTER UPDATE!!! X(!
AN ICE CUBE JST CUT ME! WHAT?!
Why is i not getting updates from ppl?! Rawwwr..
http://minxykitty.tumblr.com/ i updated! oh. i have 99 followers...coolio. :) hiiii ppl that are mostly suspended and never talk to me!!!!!!
Twitter please update to my phone.
I think the gifts i got for the girl will like them. :) i jst need markers and maybe coloring books for her last gift. :)
Rented four movies for movie monday at mr.movies. :)
Dear Brad: please message me. My phone is now on & i is waiting to talk with my lover. Now please check email. kthnxloveyoumuch.:)
Going to drop off Ethel at home. :) she's a sweet old lady. I really wish Brad would message me.
Mental note. Call Brad tomorrow. :) haven't talked since week before closing at Ron's. Need a nice chat.
One my favorite treats-almond joys! :)
Oh cheese..lol. Going down for snacks. I don't get to open any pressies tonight. :-P
Got my chef coat on. :) i look spiffy. Gonna shut off phone now. Cheers everyone.
I jst hand printed all over Mike's window...Hehehe...:)
Still feeling sick...don't know why..oh cheese maybe i'm pregnant. brad i can't believe you could knock me up virtually! Such a stud..:)
Heading to church...everyone LOVES Brad's scarf..hope he does too of course. :) wish i could go to his house..
Had ham & potato soup..against my judgement i ate the meat.Mom having WISCONSIN CHEESE! does there happen to be a Brad in there anywhere?O_O
Man my grandpa loves cologne...smells good i guess but Wowzers! Lol. :) stomach still feeling funny.
I got 3 gift cards, 2 notebooks, & a canister of bubbles. They're bribing me.
Funny. Santa's handwriting is the same as my dad's. Way to make an effort.
